page.title: 11Religion,Customs,Traditions.
page.content:
was from the Shotley Estate. Past parishioners who have left the district often choose to be intered in the graveyard. The church Verger lives at Snods Edge and rents the Glebe field from the church.
CUSTOMS AND TRADITIONS. Tradtionally in the week before Christmas, a local farmer covers a trailer with a tarpaulin and lines it with straw bales and pulls it around the parish with a tractor ,with upto a dozen carol singers aboard_carolling the local population.The proceeds of this venture go to a charity for mentally handicapped people.
